resources.string: This is a real-world, real-time, location based game. Take care whilst playing, and always be aware of hazards around you.
Playing this game whilst driving, operating machinery, cycling, or whilst in command of air or water craft may be illegal and dangerous.
Observe all local laws, and do not engage in unlawful trespass or other criminal activity.
You are solely responsible for your decision to play this game, and any consequences that may arise from doing so. Keep it fun, stay safe, and don\'t neglect other life responsibilities!

Counterforce is a free game that does not engage in any marketing whatsoever, and personal information will be treated with utmost respect. Policy changes will always be by prior agreement in order to continue playing, should Counterforce ever become a marketable product.

A unique, securely-encrypted key derived from your device\'s identity is used for the sole purpose of identifying your account. Other non-personally-identifying parameters of the device, and lists of running apps/services, may be accessed to prevent cheating.

Your real world location will be shared with other players. A \"Privacy Zone\" feature exists which allows you to obscure sensitive locations such as home and workplaces from the game. It is advisable to make use of this facility before you begin playing, by clicking the icon on the registration screen or accessing it in the Settings menu later. It bears the following symbol:

All in-game activity is logged on the server for administration, debugging and development purposes. Cooperation with the UK authorities (or their nominated parties) will be made in the highly unlikely event that they should wish to access the data for the purposes of law enforcement, security or national interests.

Manipulating your GPS location (\"location spoofing\"), multi-accounting from one device and use of emulators are STRICTLY FORBIDDEN. These are all easily detected, and permanent IP bans, with NO PRIOR WARNING, shall apply to each. DO NOT CONTINUE IF YOU ARE USING AN EMULATOR, HAVE MODIFIED YOUR DEVICE\'S IMEI/MEID OR HAVE ANY APPS INSTALLED THAT WOULD FACILITATE GPS POSITION MANIPULATION OR MULTI ACCOUNTING (Such as \"Fake GPS Location\" and \"Parallel Space\"). This is taken very seriously and there will be no more warnings! Play fair or don\'t play at all!

Usernames, avatars or other in-game communications that are offensive, pornographic, gory or discriminatory will not be tolerated and offending players will be banned. If you have a problem with other cultures, the game provides other legitimate features with which to express your disapproval; but don\'t be surprised when they shoot back!

The gameplay mechanics, features and configurations are subject to change at any time, without notice, for development purposes. All players are invited (and encouraged) to share their opinions on these matters via the Discord group.
Exploiting \"faults\" with the game rules, or other forms of \"gamesmanship\", is actively encouraged; it makes the issues easier to identify and fix!
I agree to the above, that I am solely responsible for my own actions and choice to play this game, and will exercise common sense when doing so.
A unique identity could not be determined for this device, because it is either a non-cellular tablet, emulator, unsupported phone, or the "Telephony"/"Read Phone State" permission was not enabled.
Unfortunately, only cellular phones (or other devices that at least take a SIM card) are supported.

Emulator use is strictly forbidden. Registering an account with one will result in a permanent ban not only for that account, but for all devices that are determined to have shared the same IP or geographical address too! DO NOT CONTINUE if this is the case. Press \"Quit\".

If you are using a regular cellular phone and thus getting this message in error, please \"Quit\", check that all permissions required by this app are enabled in the app settings, and try again. Please e-mail the developer or report to the Discord group if this does not fix the problem.
Equip this system to fire missiles from your location.
Equip this system to intercept enemy missiles from your location.
Missile launch sites fire cruise missiles, allowing you to attack other players globally.
SAM sites store interceptor missiles and engage enemy cruise missiles with them, protecting you and your assets.
Gun turrets fire artillery shells at ground targets, for base defence or lighter close-range assaults.
Established at %1$s accuracy, but must be better than %2$s. Searching for better...
You cannot build here as you are too close to other structures.\nYou must be at least %1$s from:
You cannot build an ore mine here as all ore in the vicinity is already being mined.\nYou must be at least %1$s from:
Your online structures cost %1$s per hour.
Your maintenance costs exceed your wealth generation.
Using %1$s location (%2$.6f, %3$.6f) with accuracy %4$s from %5$s ago.
The following players wish to join %1$s
You have no available missiles in range of this target.
You have no available interceptors in range of this target.
Click on the map to define a new privacy zone, or click existing zones to edit them.
Your player is currently within this privacy zone. It will become effective only once your player has moved outside of it.
You are in a privacy zone. Using your last location outside of this zone.
Please register a username and avatar:
Please specify an alliance name, description and avatar:
Your alliance is at war with this alliance.
You have requested to join this alliance, and are waiting for a leader to approve or decline.
Alliance name taken. Please specify another.
A major software update has been released.
The update must be installed before you can log in again. It should be available to all regions within a few hours.
You must specify a target. Touch locations or entities on the map to designate them as a target first.
You must specify a target. Touch missiles on the map to designate them as a target first.
Target out of range. You may only designate a target within the range circle.
Wilful friendly fire is not allowed.
Your interceptor cannot intercept the selected missile.
Waiting for data. Please try again in a moment.
You must respawn before you can do this!
Players cannot carry nuclear weapons. You must build a nuclear missile site.
You must build a nuclear missile site to purchase nukes.
The system is reloading and cannot yet fire.
This missile is preparing and cannot yet fire.
The system is offline and cannot fire.
Decommission %1$s for %2$s refund? (this will take %3$s to complete)
Remotely repair %1$s for %2$s? Note that you can repair it for free by visiting its location.

Are you sure you want to close your account?

Your player will be removed from the game, and deleted completely after %1$s provided you don't open the app.

You can cancel this by opening the app again within this time.

Note that your player will "die" as per normal game rules, losing points accordingly, but also suffering a minimum 24 hour respawn time to prevent abuse of this function. Any attacking players will receive full points for killing you.
Construct a %1$s at your location for %2$s?
Construct an %1$s at your location for %2$s?
Switch SAM site to auto?\n\nIn auto mode, the SAM site will engage threats automatically at any time, regardless of whether you\'re online or alive.
Switch SAM site to semi auto?\n\nIn semi auto mode, the SAM site will only automatically engage threats when you are offline or dead. You will have control whenever you are online and alive.
Switch SAM site to manual?\n\nIn manual mode, the SAM site will not engage threats automatically. You will have full control.
Request to join %1$s? This will cancel your request to join %2$s.
Leave %1$s? You will have to wait %2$s before you can join or create another alliance.
Leave %1$s? As you are the only leader, this will disband the alliance. You will have to wait %2$s before you can join or create another alliance.
Promote %1$s to be a leader of %2$s? This promotion will be permanent until they leave.
Declare war on %1$s? This war will last until the end of the week (%2$s) or until either alliance disbands.
You are in the cooloff period from leaving your previous alliance, and must wait %1$s before you can create or join another.
You are dead. You may respawn in %s.
Use two fingers to set the avatar image bounds.
Please select the avatar image bounds.
Upgrade the launcher from %1$d slots to %2$d for %3$s?
Upgrade the reload system from %1$s to %2$s for %3$s?
Upgrade to take nuclear missiles for %1$s?

Bring %1$s online?

It will cost %2$s per hour to run.

It will take %3$s to boot.

Take %1$s offline?

You will save %2$s per hour.

It takes %3$s to bring it back online.
You will heal naturally in %1$s. Heal fully now for %2$s?
You will die of radiation poisoning in %1$s unless you leave the radioactive area or it dissipates. Heal fully now for %2$s?
You are already at full health.
You are dead and cannot heal.
Build a SAM site or buy an air defence system to protect yourself from threats.
Build a missile site or buy a cruise missile system.
Your structures will spontaneously go offline if you can\'t afford the hourly costs.
You can\'t do anything and aren\'t generating income. Respawn as soon as possible.
Radiation slowly drains your HP. If you can\'t leave, you should heal yourself periodically.
Hourly wealth generation stops above %1$s. Spend some money!
%1$s is much less powerful than you. Attacking them would be dishonorable. Continue?
%1$s is much more powerful than you. Attacking them will likely result in a devastating retaliation. Continue?
%1$s is respawn protected. Them and their semi-transparent structures are currently invulnerable for %2$s. Continue?
You are currently respawn protected, and will be invulnerable for %1$s. Launching a missile will remove this invulnerability now. Continue?
You are currently respawn protected, and will be invulnerable for %1$s. Manually launching an interceptor will remove this invulnerability now. Continue?
Nuclear missiles create a radioactive area that damages players, and a large EMP pulse that can knock structures offline.
This missile will follow targeted players, even if they move.
This missile has electronic countermeasures that reduce the chance of it being intercepted.
Long-press to reset this player\'s avatar.
This missile cannot be engaged by some interceptor types.
This interceptor can engage all missile types.
Welcome, commander. Would you like a tutorial?
Please specify a valid username. It must contain valid, visible characters and comply with the game rules.
Offer affiliation to %1$s? This friendship will last until the end of the week (%2$s) or until either alliance disbands.
Accept affiliation from %1$s? This friendship will last until the end of the week (%2$s) or until either alliance disbands.
Your alliance is affiliated with this alliance.
An affiliation proposal exists between your alliance and this one.
The following alliances wish to affiliate with %1$s
Alternatively, press \"Generate Identity\" to create a restricted, non-supported and non-recoverable tablet account.
Reject affiliation proposal and declare war on %1$s? This war will last until the end of the week (%2$s) or until either alliance disbands.
Counterforce requires the following permissions to be enabled:
Counterforce is a multiplayer online game, and therefore requires internet access.
TCP/IP is required for Counterforce to communicate with the game server, which this permission enables.
Counterforce offers optional vibration to accompany \"under attack\" warnings.
Configuration files and other game elements are cached on your device for efficiency. Counterforce must be able to read and write to storage to facilitate this.
Counterforce is a location-based game that uses your device\'s GPS to place your character in the game world. The \"fine location\" permission is required for this to work.
Your Counterforce account requires a unique identity, which is securely derived from your device\'s IMEI\/MEID. The \"read phone state\" permission enables this information to be retreived.
Counterforce raises optional \"under attack\" notifications. This permission enables the threat checking service to automatically re-enable itself after a reboot.
Press the button below to show prompts asking you to enable the permissions. If this doesn\'t work, you will need to enable the permissions in Android Settings \> Apps \> Counterforce \> Permissions
You will receive warnings that you or your allies are under attack.
Sentry guns provide very short range defence against missiles and unfriendly intruding players.
Ore mines discover valuable deposits of ore at random locations within %1$s, which players can go and collect.
This area is already being mined. Further online ore mines will significantly reduce the value of ore discovered!

Counterforce is struggling to determine your location. Please ensure your device\'s GPS is switched on, with high accuracy enabled. If you\'ve already done this, try taking your device outside or near a window.
A general error occurred. Please contact an administrator.
The new connection settings were not applied as they were invalid.
You are currently respawn protected, and will be invulnerable for %1$s. Buying anything nuclear will remove this invulnerability now. Continue?
You cannot leave an alliance while in battle!
%s is still in battle and cannot be kicked!
You cannot join an alliance while in battle!
%s is still in battle and cannot be accepted yet!
You cannot create an alliance while respawn protected. Your respawn protection ends in %1$s.
Notification sound & vibration are now part of Apps & Notifications in Android settings.
Join or create an alliance, that has an avatar.
Possess a defence system consisting of at least one online structure.
Cumulative bonus. You have killed %1$d players this week. Kill %2$d to earn %3$s per hour.
No attacks made this week yet.
Being allied or affiliated with %1$s of players. Currently %2$s.
Being at war with %1$s of players. Currently %2$s.
Being over %1$s from the nearest other player. Nearest: %2$s at %3$s.
You must specify a ban reason!
Having a name that broke the game rules
Uploading an image that broke the game rules
Long-press to reset this player\'s name.
